column2: (TM)Mark Duchy
Mark Duke-tier title to transfer counties to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
Mark Duke-tier title to transfer counties to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
(TM)Unmark Duchy
Unmark Duke-tier title to avoid transferring more counties to it.
Unmark Duke-tier title to avoid transferring more counties to it.
(TM)Transfer County
Transfer this county to the previously marked Duke-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
Transfer this county to the previously marked Duke-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
(TM)Mark Duchy
Mark Duke-tier title to transfer duchies to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
Mark Duke-tier title to transfer duchies to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
(TM)Unmark Duchy
Unmark Duke-tier title to avoid transferring more duchies to it.
Unmark Duke-tier title to avoid transferring more duchies to it.
(TM)Transfer Duchy
Transfer this duchy to the previously marked Duke-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
Transfer this duchy to the previously marked Duke-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
(TM)Mark Kingdom
Mark King-tier title to transfer duchies to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
Mark King-tier title to transfer duchies to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
(TM)Unmark Kingdom
Unmark King-tier title to avoid transferring more duchies to it.
Unmark King-tier title to avoid transferring more duchies to it.
(TM)Transfer Duchy
Transfer this duchy to the previously marked King-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
Transfer this duchy to the previously marked King-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
(TM)Copy Title's History
Copy this title's history to your primary title's
Copy this title's history to your primary title's
(TM)Create Kingdom Title
Create a Kingdom title based on this title
Create a Kingdom title based on this title
(TM)Mark Empire
Mark Empire-tier title to transfer kingdoms to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
Mark Empire-tier title to transfer kingdoms to it. Remember to only have one title marked at once.
(TM)Unmark Empire
Unmark Empire-tier title to avoid transferring more kingdoms to it.
Unmark Empire-tier title to avoid transferring more kingdoms to it.
(TM)Transfer Kingdom
Transfer this kingdom to the previously marked Empire-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
Transfer this kingdom to the previously marked Empire-tier title. Avoid using this if you have not marked any title.
